entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore's face is described as not looking directly at Harry, but rather fixed on a point over his shoulder. He shakes his head slightly when Harry stares at him.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is described as looking incredulously from Harry to Professor Umbridge, and speaking in a voice 'positively sagging with sarcasm'.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Professor Umbridge is mentioned as the one who brought Harry to the office.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as changing direction mid-word, and taking advantage of Fudge's momentary inattention to steal a look at Dumbledore.

relationships.description: Dumbledore gives Harry the tiniest of nods and the shadow of a wink, indicating that he should be aware of something.
Fudge is accompanying Professor Umbridge to the office where Harry is being questioned.
